QuestData.Title: Heart of Rage
QuestData.Description: As it turns out, the eggheads back at Honor Hold can't see much into this place. Bunch of lying lazy mages, is what they are.$B$BEither way, we don't really know exactly what's going on in here. So, you're going in to find out!
QuestData.LogDescription: Fully investigate the Blood Furnace and then report back to Gunny.
QuestData.RewardText: <You tell Gunny everything you saw in the Blood Furnace.>$B$BYou brought back some loot for ol' Gunny, right?$B$BNo, no, you're right, clearly I owe you a reward for all your hard work. Not like Gunny didn't arrange all this and send you in there in the first place.
